snippet.title: Megaman Makeshift Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
A third person shooter coming this fall, starring not Megaman, but a robot built in his image, designed to fill in the gaps while Megaman is off saving the world! 

In this game, you must pass trails involving passing terrain, eliminating hostile forces, and reactivating defenses to assist the humans living in areas under attack by Dr. Wily. That said, you weren't the first concept, and one of the older projects is still upset to be put on the shelf......

Music used in the trailer:
The Tallest Building, by injury
https://ocremix.org/remix/OCR00761
"Wily's Mosh Pit" by Steve Pordon
https://ocremix.org/remix/OCR00614
